title: How do u respond with toxic in champ select
body: someone picked tf into zed i said why dont you go bring exhaust, thn litterally these kids with "$C7" were all like why dont you stfu, 3 man earshot me

replies.body:
U uninstall this toxic game and be happy you did :)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Just mute them lol, not liek they are gonna produce anything good anyways
Whenever they do something stupid you just say '...' because there are just no words for those kinds of people
